cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 370 miles ESE of Cozumel, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating northwest today, crossing the northeastern Yucatan early Wednesday, then moving through the southern/central Gulf of Mexico and aiming for the north-central Gulf Coast (likely Louisiana) late Friday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch/Warning confined to Yucatan Peninsula; no U.S. watches at this time
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Tulum to Dzilam Mexico including Cozumel.  Tropical Storm Warning: Cayman Islands, western Cuba, and parts of the Yucatan coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northeastern Yucatan Wednesday, then northern Gulf Coast from Texasâ€“Louisiana border eastward to Alabama late week
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely; peak probability only 5%
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Corpus Christi given track well east
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated outer-band showers possible; heavy rainfall not expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated Gulf swell and rip-current risk late week
